plugins.name: ASCII Art Generator
plugins.description: Bring old-school, retro ASCII magic straight into Figma with the ASCII Art Generator plugin! Turn any image—portraits, logos, icons—into radiant text-based artwork inspired by classic terminal visuals.Subscription via plugin or one-time payment licenseGet one-time-payment lifetime license here ->Key FeaturesLive Image ImportUpload any image (JPG/PNG) or paste a URL and instantly see it in ASCII form.Full Adjustment Controls• Brightness, Contrast & Blur sliders• Invert toggle for negative‐style artRich Dithering Options• Floyd–Steinberg, Atkinson, Ordered Bayer & Noise dithering• Toggle “Ignore White” to preserve whitespaceMultiple Character Sets• Standard (@%#*+=-:.)• Block (█▓▒░)• Binary (0/1), Hex (0–F)• Custom “Manual” character• Ultra-detailed glyph paletteEdge-Detection Modes• Sobel outline for high-contrast edges• Difference-of-Gaussians “DOG” contour styleFlexible Output Formats (Pro)• Editable text node in Figma (pro)• PNG export• SVG code insert (pro) Vector outline (path-based)Seamless InsertionOne-click “Insert” drops your ASCII art into the canvas, centered and ready to tweak.Copy & ShareCopy pure ASCII text to clipboard or export vector/SVG code for use elsewhere.Free Trial & License• 2 free insertions under trial (PNG)• Easy upgrade flow via in-plugin “Upgrade” (current user) or “Activate License” (1 or multiple one-time-payment) buttons• Usage counter and “mouse-follower” overlay when trial ends

plugins.name: CTRL Var: Rename Variables
plugins.description: Finally, CMD/CTRL + R for variables!CTRL Var was built to give you many of the same renaming features available for layers - for variables.Preview your changesEasily view the variables in your collections, search results, and potential changes before updating.Scrollable list let's you see the full list and long path names.Change counts provided to help confirm the impact of the changes.Search your variable tablesUse the search field to find variable names within a collection.Easily identify location, patterns, and inconsistencies.Search has no impact on changes - just a needed feature.Set the scope of your name changesUse the scope field to set a path to a specific group, which will limit changes to variables within it.Scoping must start from the beginning of the path to a group of variables.Rename part of a variable's nameUse the match field to find a character or word to be replaced with something from the rename field.Cut text before or afterRemove all text from before or after the matching textUse the X → / X ← buttons or enter these short codes in the rename field:#!* (before)#*! (after).Add incrementing numbers to your variablesUse the # ↑ / # ↓ buttons to enter ascending or descending numbers to matching variables names. You can also use these short codes in the rename field:#>> (ascending from top)#<< (descending to bottom)Use the number field to control which number to start or end withThe number of < or > characters signifies the number of digits to be used. For example < is 1, << is 01, <<< is 001, etc.LimitationsVariables do not allow { } . $Variable names must be unique, no duplicatesThere is a chance the use of some special characters within your variables, such as # & < > * ! may have issues using certain short codes which contain those same characters.Copy/Paste Figma BugIf you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Rename variables like layers, CTRL/CMD + R style!

plugins.name: Multi Text Edit
plugins.description: Edit multiple text elements in a single text editorVery helpful for bulk text editing, or ask an LLM for a list of dummy content to paste into the text editor.DocsUpdate Text - each line of the text editor a selected text node in the selected X, Y, or Z order. Shortcut: press Cmd+Enter/Ctrl+Enter while in the typing to 'Update Text.'Pull Text - fills the text editor with the content of the selected text elements, so you can edit existing text and update it.Left to Right (X) - fills the leftmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Top to Bottom (Y)' if X values are equal.Top to Bottom (Y) - fills the topmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Left to Right (X)' if Y values are equal.Layer order (Z) - fills text elements in the order they appear in the Layers panel.Tip: Precisely select nested text elements using "Ctrl+Click Drag" to draw a box through a set of text elements. See Figma Docs "Selection Marquee 4." for details.This plugin was inspired by Multiple Text Editor's "List to Layers" functionality. You might try this other plugin if you'd like to generate random content for text elements in a similar way.Github Repo

accepted.name: James Bradford
accepted.description: UX Design & UI Development

plugins.name: Broken Variables Finder
plugins.description: 🔍 Broken Variables Finder✨ Easily detect and highlight missing variables in your design files.🚨 What it does:Broken Variable Finder scans the current page, or a section of your choice, in your Figma document and identifies any nodes that are connected to deleted variables or missing variable collections:🎨 Color variables (fills, strokes, effects, backgrounds)🔠 Text variables (text content, font family, font size, line height, etc.)📐 Layout variables (gap, padding, width, height, corner radius, etc.)It catches even the invisible ghost references that stay in your file after a variable is deleted!⚡ Why it matters:Get rid of broken design tokens 🧹Clean up your system for better performance & handoff 🛠Stay confident when publishing shared styles 💪Detailed results with property, node info, and quick focus button. ⚡️☕️ Buy me a coffee

plugins.name: Material Font Name Finder
plugins.description: Provides a streamlined workflow for Material Symbols icons fonts, eliminating the need to switch between applications or manually copy icons from external sources.FeaturesIcon Finder - Browse through the complete collection of Material Symbols icons organized by categories or search for a specific icon by name.Text Node Updating - When a text object is selected, clicking an icon replaces the text with the icon character.Font Application - Automatically applies a Material Symbols font to the selected text node on the Figma canvas.Clipboard Fallback - If no text object is selected, copies the icon name to clipboard with a helpful notification.Font CompatibilityFont Detection - Automatically detects if a Material Symbols font is installed on your local system. Requires the Material Symbols font to be installed locally on the user's system.Icon Validation - Material Symbol list loaded from Google’s Github repository. Plugin tests each icon to ensure it renders properly with the installed font. Automatically hides icons that don't render correctly.Text Style Override - Insert icons without disrupting your existing text styles if you already have local styles mapped to Material Symbols fonts.Statistics Display - Provides visual feedback during icon loading and validation. Shows total icons loaded, valid icons, and hidden icons.

accepted.description: Husband. Dad. CrossFitter. IT geek. UX/UI designer. Coach. Struggling gamer. Louisville fan. 20+ years of experience.

plugins.tagline: Streamlines use of Material Symbols icon fonts - search & insert names directly in Figma.

Requires the Material Symbols font to be installed locally on the user's system.Icon Validation - Material Symbol list loaded from Google’s Github repository. Plugin tests each icon to ensure it renders properly with the installed font. plugins.name: Get in Line — Round off decimals in XY Coordinates, Width & Height
plugins.description: Tired of those annoying decimal values in your Figma designs? Get in Line is here to straighten things up! 💯Whether it's X/Y coordinates, Width, or Height, this plugin rounds off all decimal values to the nearest integer in just one click — making your designs pixel-perfect. No more awkward X: 325.49 or Width: 543.8. With Get in Line, you'll get clean, crisp values like X: 325 and Width: 544. ✨💥 What It Does:✅ Round off X/Y Coordinates — Converts decimal positions into whole numbers.✅ Round off Width & Height — Keeps your shapes, frames, and elements mathematically perfect.✅ Multi-Select Support — Select multiple elements and fix them all at once.✅ Instant Feedback — Know how many elements were aligned after each click.🚀 Why Use It?Pixel Perfection: No more blurry layers caused by decimal positions.Design Hygiene: Clean, rounded dimensions keep your layout sharp.Speed Up Workflow: Align multiple elements in one go.No More OCD Triggering Numbers: Forget about X: 135.72 — now it's X: 136. 😎💡 How It Works:Select one or more elements (Frames, Shapes, SVGs, anything!).Hit the "Align" button in the plugin.Boom! All decimal values in X, Y, Width, and Height are instantly rounded off.You'll get a notification showing how many elements were aligned. 🎉💎 Get in Line is perfect for product designers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who craves that perfect, integer-based alignment. Whether you're building a design system, creating components, or fine-tuning layouts — this plugin will keep your designs clean and crisp.👉 Click 'Open' and make your elements fall in line! 🚶‍♂️✨

plugins.name: 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant
plugins.description: IntroductionSlice Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed specifically for designers to efficiently export selected design elements. Whether you're working on web designs, mobile applications, or icon creation, Slice Export Assistant caters to your diverse needs.Function DescriptionMultiple Format Support: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.Multi-Scale Exporting: Easily set different export scales with automatic increments to save your time.Custom Suffixes: Assign custom suffixes to each exported file to ensure consistent and organized file naming.Batch Exporting: Export multiple files at once and automatically generate a ZIP archive for easy downloading and management.WEBP Conversion: Built-in WEBP format conversion to enhance image optimization efficiency.How to UseSelect Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.Run the Plugin: Right-click on the selected elements, navigate to Plugins > Slice Export Assistant > Export.Configure OptionsChoose Format: Select the desired export format from PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP.Set Scale and Suffix: Add the required export scales. Each time you click the "Add" button, the scale automatically increments.Customize Suffixes: Modify or remove suffixes as needed to fit your naming conventions.Export: Click the Export button. The plugin will export the files based on your settings—downloading single files directly or packaging multiple files into a ZIP archive for download.PrecautionsEnsure Correct Selection: Make sure to select the elements you want to export on the canvas; otherwise, the plugin cannot perform the export.Browser Compatibility: WEBP format conversion relies on the browser's Canvas support. Ensure your browser is compatible.File Naming: When customizing suffixes, avoid using special characters to ensure the validity of file names.介绍切图助手是一款强大的Figma插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您高效地导出选中的设计元素。无论是网页设计、移动应用还是图标制作，切图助手都能满足您的多样化需求。功能说明多格式支持：支持导出PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。多倍数导出：轻松设置不同的导出倍数，并自动递增，节省您的时间。自定义后缀：为每个导出文件设置自定义后缀，确保文件命名规范。批量导出：支持一次导出多个文件，并自动生成ZIP压缩包，方便下载和管理。WEBP转换：内置WEBP格式转换功能，提升图片优化效率。使用方法选择元素：在Figma中选择一个或多个需要导出的设计元素。运行插件：右键点击选择的元素，导航至Plugins > 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant > Export。设置选项选择格式：从PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP中选择导出格式。设置倍数和后缀：添加所需的导出倍数，每次点击“添加”按钮，倍数自动递增。自定义后缀：根据需要修改或删除后缀内容。导出：点击导出按钮，插件将根据设置导出文件，单文件直接下载，多文件打包为ZIP下载。注意事项确保选择正确：请先在画布上选中要导出的元素，否则插件无法执行导出操作。浏览器支持：WEBP格式转换依赖于浏览器的Canvas支持，请确保您的浏览器兼容。文件命名：自定义后缀时，请避免使用特殊字符，以确保文件名的有效性。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.name: Layer Duplicator Pro
plugins.description: Layer Duplicator ProLayer Duplicator Pro is an innovative plugin for Figma designed to streamline the process of duplicating and modifying design layers using data from Excel spreadsheets. Whether you're managing complex design projects or iterating on prototypes, this tool enhances efficiency and accuracy by integrating structured data seamlessly into your Figma workspace.Main Features:Effortless Integration: Import data directly from Excel into Figma to duplicate layers and apply modifications swiftly.Structured Data Handling: Manage detailed information about design layers through Excel, ensuring precise replication and edits.Visual Representation: Review and validate changes clearly within Figma, enhancing collaboration and decision-making.Enhanced Workflow: Optimize design iterations by leveraging Excel's organizational capabilities directly within Figma.How to Use:Download Data: Extract specific details from layers into an Excel file. First, select the layer you wish to duplicate. An Excel file with the necessary structure will be automatically generated and downloaded.Import and Duplicate: Once the automatically generated Excel file has been downloaded, generate rows corresponding to each element that will be duplicated based on the selected layer. You can modify these elements by editing the corresponding columns in the Excel file. Layer Duplicator Pro will automatically adjust the indicated parameters and create a duplicated layer with the desired dimensions.Review Results: Efficiently validate changes and errors through intuitive visual feedback within Figma.Benefits:Increased Productivity: Simplify complex design tasks and accelerate project timelines.Improved Collaboration: Foster better teamwork by visualizing changes and updates clearly.Streamlined Processes: Eliminate manual duplication efforts and streamline iterative design workflows.Next Steps:Explore how Layer Duplicator Pro can revolutionize your design process by integrating structured data seamlessly from Excel into Figma. Enhance productivity and creativity with a tool designed to simplify and elevate your design workflow.

plugins.name: Text Contrast
plugins.description: The fastest contrast checker in the galaxy! Text Contrast lets you instantly run a AA or AAA contrast report on all text across your selected mockups before you can blink. Simply select a frames, groups, or components, and hit Check.A detailed report will automatically display next to your artboard, giving you immediate feedback on color contrast compliance.Hot Features:The plugin quickly calculates contrast ratios between text and its background, ensuring compliance with WCAG 2.2 standards.No need to be an expert, results appear instantly as a visual copy next to the original, with a focus on contrast and font size.The plugin won’t alter your design. Results are shown as an overlay, maintaining your original layout.Select your artboard, click "CHECK", and voilà! Get immediate results without leaving your workflow. How It Works:Easy Interaction: Select your artboard and click "CHECK." The plugin analyzes the contrast between the text color and its parent fill color.Focused Analysis: The calculation is based on the contrast ratio and font sizes, providing fast, accurate results for single color text layers. Limitations:The plugin operates over frames, groups, and components but only supports one artboard at a time.It currently does not support gradients or mixed color/font size text layers.This is my first plugin, so feel free to share any feedback ♥️

accepted.name: Basile Fécourt
accepted.description: Sr Product Designer - North America

plugins.tagline: Figure out text contrast issues reported directly on the artboard.

plugins.name: Translized
plugins.description: About TranslizedJumpstart your software localization journey right from the design phase with Translized’s Figma plugin. This tool empowers you to integrate translations directly into your UI designs within Figma. You can also upload your translation terms from Figma into Translized, streamlining your workflow and ensuring timely completion of the localization process (leveraging both human and machine translation).Avoid common pitfalls like translations disrupting your UI layout. Provide your translators with the context they need through integrated screenshots. Explore more at translized.com.Features:Easy Translation Uploads: Transfer your translation terms from Figma straight to Translized.Live UI Visualization: See your translations come to life within your Figma UI designs.Contextual Clarity for Translators: Enhance translation accuracy with context-providing screen uploads.Consistent Naming Conventions: Establish key names for your translation terms, bridging your copy, design, and code seamlessly.Getting Started with Translized in Figma:Open Your ProjectInstall the Plugin: Head over to the Plugins section and install the Translized plugin.Link Your Account: Provide your API Access Token (found under Account/API Access) to link your Translized account. If you don’t have an account yet, sign up for free at translized.com.Prepare Your Texts: In Figma, select your texts. Check and modify key names as needed, and then upload them to Translized.Select Project and Language: Finalize your upload by choosing the appropriate project and language.Upload Screenshots: (Available on the Premium plan) Ensure to check ‘Upload screenshots’ for added context in translations.Translate on Translized: Utilize machine translation, professional human translation services, or manually translate your content on the Translized platform.Pull Translations into Figma: Use the ‘Pull Translations’ tab to select your project and language. This action will create a new page in Figma with all texts translated into the selected language.Need more guidance? Visit our comprehensive documentation page for detailed instructions.Contact us through email: info@translized.com if you need any assistance.
plugins.tagline: Add translations from & to your design easily

plugins.name: MEMO | シンプルなメモ帳
plugins.description: このプラグインは、ファイルごとに個人用のメモを残せるシンプルなメモ帳です。こんな時におすすめコメントが溢れてしまったプロジェクトで必要なコメントだけをピックアップして残したいときに、コメントのリンクをメモして整理できます。ページ数が多いプロジェクトで後回しにした作業場所をすぐに見つけたいときに、その場所のリンクをメモしておけます。他の人からまとめてリンクを共有されたときコメントやフレームのリンクをこのメモに貼り付けておけば、クリック一つでその場所にスムーズに移動できます。外部メモやチャットからFigma内リンクを開くと、ブラウザを経由して遅れることが多いですが、このプラグインならタイムラグなしで移動可能です。特にクライアントに画面共有しながら説明する際などに便利です。
